name: Notion RTL - Full sections
description:
We made it really easy to switch Notion to right-to-left by style.

Here's a handy list of common right-to-left languages:
Arabic
Farsi
Hebrew
Urdu
Yiddish

Most blocks are right to left. But if you can improve the style, help us at GitHub.
https://github.com/ndr053/notion-rtl
